bug.short_desc: [Platform Project] Create Bugzilla component for statistical reports.

long_desc.thetext:
[Platform Project] Create Bugzilla component for statistical reports.
The following plug-ins and feature are not in a Bugzilla component:
Plugins: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user
Feature: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt
We should create a component (Platform.UI.Reporting) in Bugzilla to support these plug-ins and feature in past and future releases.
NOTE: This new component should be added to the TPTP Project Matrix:
http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html
NOTE 2: This is already a Platform.UI.Reporting component under the Test Project that will be renamed in the near future.
Component added to bugzilla and matrix file change checked into Head

What are the Bugzilla components and their product? I could not find them in Bugzilla.
The plug-ins are still under the Platform.UI.Charting component in the matrix.
Platform.UI.Reporting was created under TPTP profiling in bugzilla
Changes committed to Head for matrix updates

The new component was not added to the TPTP Project Matrix. I added the following to /org.eclipse.hyades.releng.builder/releases/4.5.0/release_4.5.0.xml:
<Component bugzillaComponent="Platform.UI.Reporting" committers="jkubasta" leadCommitter="jkubasta" name="Platform Reporting" plugins="org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui" technology="UI"/>
And updated:
<Component bugzillaComponent="Platform.Doc" committers="" leadCommitter="jkubasta" name="Documentation" plugins="org.eclipse.tptp.platform.doc.user org.eclipse.tptp.platform.doc.isv org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.doc.isv org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.doc.user org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.new.doc.isv org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.new.doc.user org.eclipse.tptp.platform.analysis.core.ui.doc org.eclipse.hyades.probekit.doc.user org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user" technology="Documentation"/>
Joel: Please regenerate the matrix.

I had made matrix changes to: http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html
Joel: where should the updates be made?

(In reply to comment #6) > I had made matrix changes to: > http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html > > Joel: where should the updates be made? >
The changes are made to the release_4.5.0.xml as done by Paul. This is used to generate the html file.
Thanks Paul.
